content: sides to form a circle single_crochet around 14 sts 3­6 single_crochet around 14 sts note now is a good time to stuff the body 7 decrease every st 7sts 8 decrease every st 4sts finish off and sew hole shut arms make 2 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring with black 2 increase every stitch 10 sts 3­8 single_crochet around finish off leave tail for sewing on sew on arms you ve got your own little ninja
